Democrats resolved on #Impeachment on POTUS's inauguration day. Rep. Al Green even said today, “If the Senate does not convict, that does not mean it’s over,” and then suggested the House could pursue impeachment again on other grounds if the Senate didn't vote to remove POTUS.

House Democrats have now unveiled #ArticlesOfImpeachment against President Trump, despite continued lack of evidence. This is an embarrassing day for the House of Representatives and just one more phase in what has been a blatant miscarriage of justice from the start.

“If you accept all their presumptions, it would be obstruction. But impeachments have to be based on proof, not presumptions.”
-Prof Jonathan Turley (vocal critic of POTUS), in Judiciary hearing yesterday

No evidence, no obstruction.

#ShamImpeachment

Democrats built the case on a fraudulent dossier that was paid for by Clinton supporters & her campaign. It was an illegitimate investigation attempting an unprecedented result—removal of a President. We now must work to restore public confidence & trust in our legal system.

Over a year ago, the Republican-led House Select Committee on Intelligence conducted its own investigation and found no evidence of collusion. Yet Democrats persisted in claims that President Trump colluded with the Russians to steal the election. They are wrong.

Special Counsel Mueller’s investigation on potential collusion between Russia and the Trump campaign during the 2016 election is finally over. After 22 months and $25 million expended, it proved nothing surprising or new.
